game_description: Once upon a time, the notorious Pig Brothers gang invaded the New World, blasting and disfiguring nature to build their secret base. Portrayed as evil by the media – who have been bought and paid for by the Pig Brothers – the Wolf is the last defense between Nature and the brothers’ greed. With no one to stop them, the Pig Brothers are laying waste to everything in their path, raking in the cash. Everyone thinks that Wolf is dead, but there’s a sliver of hope. It turns out that Wolf has upgraded his body with high-end prosthetic arms loaded with all sorts of weaponry, including shotguns and bombs! Nature has its defender at last. Will the Pig Brothers pay the ultimate price? **NOTICE: The Wolf and Pigs Multiplayer Beta version will be released on August 00, 2022. Up to 4 players can race on brand new stages. Compete with friends and aim for the fastest race time! Wolf and Pigs Multiplayer Beta is still under development and may be terminated without notice.
review_1: I was actually looking forward to playing this and when I did there's no smooth turning which is better for my eyes and also why the heck aren't achievements unlocking when they should be, unless developers fix/update these issues I wouldn't bother Update : well there was a patch and nothing has been fixed achievements still won't unlock, I will most likely be refunding this game and I would encourage others not to purchase this unless they actually do something about it
review_2: Love the story so far and like the way it's told Cartoon graphics suit this really well It's got a bit of everything puzzle solveing shooting blocking swinging just like spiderman
